author: IGN
description:
Watch the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Tactical Takedown release date trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactical game developed by Strange Scaffold. Players will take on new threats with Splinter and Shredder being dead coupled with adulthood fast approaching for everyone's favorite Turtles. Get a look at new gameplay for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Tactical Takedown, launching on May 22 for PC (Steam).

#TMNT #Gaming #TeenageMutantNinjaTurtles
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Tactical Takedown - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Experience the beauty hidden within terror in this new Japanese psychological horror game. In Ebisugaoka, a secluded town, Hinako Shimizu's once-familiar home transforms into a haunting nightmare as a sudden fog envelops the area. As the town falls silent and the fog thickens, Hinako must navigate the twisted paths of Ebisugaoka, solving complex puzzles and confronting grotesque monsters to survive. 

Immerse yourself in Hinako's world, crafted by renowned author Ryukishi07, and enhanced by entrancing soundscapes from Akira Yamaoka, along with stunning visuals in a gripping story of doubt, regret, and inescapable choices. Will Hinako discover the beauty hidden within terror, or will she succumb to the madness that lies ahead? 

Discover a new chapter in the SILENT HILL series, which blends psychological horror with a haunting Japanese setting. Silent Hill f is available to wishlist on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #SilentHill
title: Silent Hill f - Official Japanese Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Battlefield 2042 War Machine event trailer for the latest addition to the first-person multiplayer shooter franchise developed by DICE. The new War Machine Event is fast approaching tasking players to conquer three modes and save humanity from extinction. Players must hold capture points in Domination, hold back hordes of AI robots in Override, and handle the onslaught of King of the Hill to claim victory. Secure event unlockable rewards like Machines vs Humans Cosmetics with 30 tiers of an all-new Event Pass as well. The War Machine Event will run from March 18 through April 15 for Battlefield 2042 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Battlefield2042 #Gaming #Games
title: Battlefield 2042 - Official War Machine Event Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the F1 trailer for this upcoming film from Apple Original Films and the filmmakers from Top Gun: Maverick. F1 stars Brad Pitt, Damson Idris, Kerry Condon, Tobias Menzies, Kim Bodnia, and Javier Bardem.

Dubbed “the greatest that never was,” Sonny Hayes (Brad Pitt) was FORMULA 1’s most promising phenom of the 1990s until an accident on the track nearly ended his career.  Thirty years later, he’s a nomadic racer-for-hire when he’s approached by his former teammate Ruben Cervantes (Javier Bardem), owner of a struggling FORMULA 1 team that is on the verge of collapse.  Ruben convinces Sonny to come back to FORMULA 1 for one last shot at saving the team and being the best in the world.  He’ll drive alongside Joshua Pearce (Damson Idris), the team's hotshot rookie intent on setting his own pace. But as the engines roar, Sonny’s past catches up with him and he finds that in FORMULA 1, your teammate is your fiercest competition—and the road to redemption is not something you can tr
title: F1 - Official Trailer (2025) Brad Pitt, Javier Bardem, Kerry Condon

description:

Players will embark on a journey to save a sister alongside the whole of humanity with modern features. Lost Soul Aside is launching with DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation and realistic ray-traced reflections and shadows on day one for PC players to enjoy. Lost Soul Aside is launching on May 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

Stellar Blade is coming to PC soon with DLSS 4 fitted with Multi Frame Generation and Reflex to offer the game's definitive edition on PC. author: IGN
description:
TerrorBytes: The Evolution of Horror is a five-part documentary series, featuring over 50 horror luminaries, including acclaimed filmmaker John Carpenter and Silent Hill composer Akira Yamaoka. Each episode delves into a different theme, beginning with survival horror and then moving onto licensed games, FMV and interactive movie games, the indie horror scene, and ending on “cursed” and controversial games.

TerrorBytes: The Evolution of Horror is available to pre-order now ahead of its release in April, with exclusive perks including early digital access to episodes 1 and 2, your name in the credits, access to the Darkness Unlimited streaming service, and a digital copy of FPS: First Person Shooter.
title: TerrorBytes: The Evolution of Horror Gaming - Official Trailer (2025) John Carpenter, Akira Yamaoka

Hide by physically ducking beneath your desk while exploring a strange game never meant to be played. Eyes Never Wake will be available on PC via Steam. You can wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2526200/Eyes_Never_Wake/

author: IGN
description:
In Rainbow Six Siege X's new Dual Front mode, a predetermined seasonal Operator pool will dictate who you can play, and team sizes are bumped up to six per side. Instead of spawning directly inside (or outside) one target area, there are three large areas to choose from, each with its own objective, so your team of six will need to split up to focus on both defending and attacking different locations simultaneously. While the scope has expanded, much of the great core gameplay remains the same. Previewed by Brian Barnett

#IGN
title: Rainbow Six Siege X: Dual Front Mode Hands-On Impressions

description:
Don't miss the Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Gustave character trailer for the upcoming story-driven turn-based fantasy RPG developed by Sandfall Interactive. Players can get the rundown on Gustave, a resourceful and dedicated engineer from Lumière who has dedicated his life to the city’s defense and agricultural systems, striving to protect and provide for his people. Check out some of his cinematic dialogue and gameplay sequences in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, launching on April 24 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

author: IGN
description:
My Pet Hooligan is an online multiplayer shooter available on the Epic Games Store and coming soon to Steam and Xbox. In this game, you and other Hooligans battle it out in adrenaline-fueled combat across Hooliland City. Fight for dominance, destroy everything in sight, and rebel against Metazuckbot by using an arsenal of weapons, explosives, and even graffiti across the map.

Download on Epic Games Store:
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/my-pet-hooligan-453949

author: IGN
description:
IGN’s got you covered on all of the best anime we recommend you watch before diving into Assassin's Creed Shadows! So whether you’re looking to live out your ninja fantasy or you simply want to discover the captivating world of feudal japan for yourself, here are our recommendations for anime to watch before playing Assassin’s Creed Shadows! Today's episode includes:  Brave 10,  Ninja Scroll, and  Ninja Kamui.
For those looking for some samurai recommendations, check out our samurai episode!
You can look forward to Assassin’s Creed Shadows coming March 20th on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series Consoles, PC– including Steam, and Mac. And for more on all things Assassin’s Creed Shadows – stay tuned to IGN.
Presented by Assassin's Creed Shadows.
title: Ninja Anime to Help Immerse Yourself Into Assassin's Creed Shadows - Recommendation Machine

author: IGN
description:
Spinal Tap II: The End Continues, directed by Rob Reiner with Christopher Guest, Michael McKean, and Harry Shearer reprising their iconic roles as the legendary heavy metal band Spinal Tap. Reiner returns as documentarian Martin “Marty” DiBergi, with cameos from music legends Elton John, Paul McCartney, and Garth Brooks and Trisha Yearwood. Also appearing will be Paul Shaffer, Fran Drescher, Don Lake, John Michael Higgins, Nina Conti, Griffin Matthews, Kerry Godliman, and Chris Addison.

#IGN #Movies
title: Spinal Tap II: The End Continues - Official Teaser Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss this Assassin's Creed Shadows gameplay! Assassins Creed is known for its immersive historical settings and beautiful landscapes, and AC Shadows continues that tradition, with its detailed take on feudal Japan. And with the game launching in just over a week, here are nine of the most impressive vistas we’ve seen in Assassins Creed Shadows.

This Assassin's Creed Shadows 4K gameplay was captured via GeForce Now Ultimate.

#AssassinsCreed #AssassinsCreedShadows #Gaming
title: 9 Of The Most Impressive Looking Vistas In Assassin’s Creed Shadows - 4K Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Sneaks follows the adventures of Ty, a misguided designer sneaker who doesn’t know life outside the comforts of his velvet-lined shoe box. After his sister is stolen by a shady collector, Ty must venture into NYC to find and rescue her. In his adventure, Ty meets a rag-tag group of footwear friends from all walks of life who help him find the courage to step outside of his shoe box and find his “sole-mate.”

The stellar voice cast includes Anthony Mackie, Martin Lawrence, Swae Lee, Chloe Bailey, Macy Gray, Ella Mai, Mustard, Roddy Rich, Quavo, Young Miko, Amirah Hall, Kiana Ledé, Bobbito Garcia, Sam Jay, Jonathan Kite, Amari McCoy, Donovan Louise Bazemore, Sky Brown Rayssa Leal, Rico Rodriguez, Will McCormack, Michael Govier, Andrew Hawkins Raoul the Dog with Keith David, Chris Paul, and Laurence Fishburne.

The animated family film also features new music by Grammy winner Mustard.

Directed by Rob Edwards and Chris Jenkins, Sneaks will be released in theaters nationwide on April 18,
title: Sneaks - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Anthony Mackie, Martin Lawrence, Swae Lee

author: IGN
description:
Check out this exclusive Void Martyrs reveal trailer! Ever played as a nun in a game before? You will in Void Martyrs, a grimdark, top-down action game in which you are sent on a crusade to recover treasured relics at the edge of a blackhole, only to face off against those affected by a biomechanical plague. The Stigmata/Faith system will give consequence to your gameplay choices. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3470850/Void_Martyrs/

#Gaming #IGN #VoidMartyrs
title: Void Martyrs - Exclusive Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this new Dune: Awakening trailer, exploring the desert planet of Arrakis. Prepare to traverse the most dangerous planet in the Dune universe, from climbing the highest peaks to flying the iconic Ornithopter in this upcoming open-world survival MMO developed by Funcom. Locate resources using your personal scanner and modules attached to your vehicles, claim powerful tech, and launch survey probes that populate your map with important points of interest, such as abandoned ecology labs and shipwrecks.

The Dune: Awakening release date is May 20, 2025 for PC with a release date for PS5 (PlayStation 5) and Xbox Series X/S to be announced at a later date.

#DuneAwakening #Dune #Gaming
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Exploring Arrakis Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the PowerWash Simulator 2 reveal trailer for a look at the upcoming pressure washing sim sequel from FuturLab. Return to Muckingham in a brand new campaign featuring a variety of fresh locations, improved visuals, soap-erior equipment, and more. Get your first look at some PowerWash Simulator 2 gameplay in this announcement trailer.

PowerWash Simulator 2 will be released in late 2025 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, Windows). It's available to wishlist now.

#PowerWashSimulator #Gaming #Games
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Don't miss the Half-Life 2 RTX full ray tracing and DLSS 4 trailer for the community-driven effort to enhance Half-Life 2 developed by Orbifold Studios. Players can now enjoy the classic first-person shooter with modern enhancements and features such as full ray tracing, remastered assets, and DLSS 4. Multi Frame Generation is also coming alongside these additions to a demo of Half-Life 2 RTX on March 18 for PC.

#HalfLife #HalfLife2RTX #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
From Intergender gameplay to online MyGM and realistic bruising, here are 8 changes that actually make a difference in WWE 2K25 and why you should acknowledge this year’s grappling action.
Like previous years, WWE 2K25 arrives with the promise of headline features and marketing lines encouraging you to part with your hard-earned money. But do you need to buy WWE 2K25? Roster and cosmetic updates aside, is WWE 2K25 really that much different from WWE 2K24? Here are 8 reasons why you should consider diving into some WWE 2K25 gameplay.

00:00 - Intro
00:33 - WWE 2K25 Intergender Matches
01:17 - WWE 2K25 Chain Wrestling
02:11 - WWE 2K25 Danger Warning
02:51 - WWE 2K25 Online MyGM
03:33 - WWE 2K25 Unified MyRISE
04:24 - WWE 2K25 Battle Damage
05:32 - WWE 2K25 Barricade Moves
06:33 - WWE 2K25 Third Person Camera

#WWE #Wrestling #WWE2K25
title: WWE 2K25: 8 Changes That Actually Make a Difference

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Mirthwood trailer to see what you can expect with the Marriage update, which adds new features, expanded social systems, and quality-of-life improvements to the RPG. In the Marriage Update, will you show your spouse the care and attention they need when sickness strikes, or will the allure of the local tavern and financial ruin tear your love apart? Divorce isn’t inevitable, but the choice is yours to make in the Mirthwood Marriage Update.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mirthwood - Official Marriage Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss this Half Life 2 RTX gameplay, captured on an RTX 5090 running at 4K 60FPS! Welcome back to 2004, but with a 2025 twist! This is Half-Life 2, Valve's iconic FPS, remastered with NVIDIA RTX Remix, and built by Orbifold Studios. This remaster transforms City 17 with updated lighting, shadows, reflections, ray tracing, DLSS 4, enhanced assets and more. In this Half Life 2 gameplay demo, you'll see Half Life 2's 'We Don't Go To Revenholm' and 'Nova Prospekt' levels.

Fancy checking out Half-Life 2 RTX yourself? The Half-Life 2: RTX Remix public build drops on March 18, 2025.

#HalfLife #Gaming #IGN
title: Half-Life 2: RTX Remix Remaster Gameplay (RTX 5090, 4K 60FPS)

author: IGN
description: Naughty Dog’s Neil Druckmann recently told fans hoping for The Last of Us Part 3 “don’t bet on it” anytime soon, which may be a disappointment for some, but is par for the course after looking back at Naughty Dog’s track record. Considering how long it takes to make a AAA video game, and the studio’s been exclusively working on The Last of Us and Uncharted games for the last fifteen years, you can’t really blame them for wanting to try something new like Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet.
title: Naughty Dog is Moving On From The Last of Us (And It's About Time) - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A minority shareholder in Ubisoft is planning a protest against the company, claiming it's "horribly mismanaged." The shareholder alleges that Ubisoft has not been transparent and is "hiding information," including partnerships with the Savvy Group, and holding talks with Microsoft, EA, and others regarding possibly selling Ubisoft IP (maybe that's the only way we'll get a new Splinter Cell). In other news, EA's skate. is in closed alpha testing, but that isn't stopping them from selling microtransactions. EA claims this is to test the store feature to make sure it all works at launch. Mmm hmm. Any purchases made during this testing period will basically be converted back into in-game currency at launch. And speaking of EA, in positive news, Hazelight Studios' co-op Split Fiction not only is getting rave reviews, but sales as well. The game has sold 1 million copies in just 48 hours.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ubisoft Shareholder Threatens Protest After Alleged IP Talks with Microsoft, Others - IGN Daily Fix

description: It’s time to return to Silent Hill! Join us on Thursday, March 13th at 3pm PT as we venture into the mysterious world of Silent Hill f. What lies ahead of us in this new chapter of one of the most beloved horror series around?
